rules_text:
Duplicity [i](When this permanent enters, target opponent creates a copy of the back face of this card and casts the copy without paying its mana cost if able.)[/i]
You control opponents while they’re choosing modes for spells and abilities and while they’re choosing targets for those modes.
notes:
Inspiration — Mind control, illusion of free will

Mechanical Uniqueness — Player control under specific circumstances, forcing players to cast spells

Plays slow. Cool concept. Maybe decrease cost and do a charm instead?
